en: Blessed is he that considereth the poor: Jehovah will deliver him in the day of evil.
hmr: Rimsihai ngaituo mi chu mi hamṭha a nih, Lunginzîng ni chun ama chu LALPAIN sanhim a tih.

en: Jehovah will preserve him, and keep him alive, And he shall be blessed upon the earth; And deliver not thou him unto the will of his enemies.
hmr: LALPAIN ama chu humhimin sukhring a ta, hnuoia hin malsâwmin um a tih; Nangin ama dotuhai nuom nuoma an thaw dingin pe naw ti ni.

en: Jehovah will support him upon the couch of languishing: Thou makest all his bed in his sickness.
hmr: LALPAIN a chauna zâlhmuna chun sukhrât a ta, Nangin a damnaw laiin a zâlna siempêk vawng i tih,

en: I said, O Jehovah, have mercy upon me: Heal my soul; for I have sinned against thee.
hmr: Keiin, “Aw LALPA, mi lungin- siet la, Ka hringna hi sukdam la, i chungah thil ka suksuol sih a,” ka tih a.

en: Mine enemies speak evil against me, saying, When will he die, and his name perish?
hmr: A mi dotuhai chun, “Iengtik am thîng a ta, a hming bo a ti aw?” tiin, An mi hrilsiet hlak a.

en: And if he come to see me, he speaketh falsehood; His heart gathereth iniquity to itself: When he goeth abroad, he telleth it.
hmr: Chun, anni laia tuin amanih a mi hung kan hlakin, thu teplo mei mei a hril hlak a; A lungril chun suolna a lâk khâwm hlak a, A fe suok phingleh mi a hril hlak.

en: All that hate me whisper together against me; Against me do they devise my hurt.
hmr: A mi theidatuhai po po chun an mi hêkna thu se sein an lâk a, A mi suksietna ding an ngaituo hlak.

en: An evil disease, say they, cleaveth fast unto him; And now that he lieth he shall rise up no more.
hmr: “Natna ṭha nawtakin a tlâkkhum tah a, Tuta a zâl hi tho nawk ta naw nih,” an ta.

en: Yea, mine own familiar friend, in whom I trusted, Who did eat of my bread, Hath lifted up his heel against me.
hmr: Anih, ka ruol pâwlngei, ka ringtak, ka bei fâkpui ngei chun, A kekhawng chu ka chungah ân let tah a.

en: But thou, O Jehovah, have mercy upon me, and raise me up, That I may requite them.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, aw LALPA,nangin mi lunginsiet la, Anni chu ka thung theina dingin mi keitho nâwk rawh.

en: By this I know that thou delightest in me, Because mine enemy doth not triumph over me.
hmr: Hitaka hin ka chungah, i lâwm ti ka hriet, A mi dotu chun a mi hne ngai naw leiin.

en: And as for me, thou upholdest me in mine integrity, And settest me before thy face for ever.
hmr: Kei chu lungril ṭhatak ka putnaa hin nangin i mi chel zing a, I hmaa chun kumkhuoa dingin i mi sieh a.

en: Blessed be Jehovah, the God of Israel, From everlasting and to everlasting. Amen, and Amen.
hmr: LALPA, Israel Pathien chu, Chatuona inthawka chatuon chenin inpâkin um raw se, Amen, Amen.
